subject: re:Can't afford medications you need
body:
Dear customer.
It's not a secret that there are lots of online pharmacies that cheat their clients by selling fake drugs in order to make extra profits. We don't. 
At CanadianPharmacy you will be able to find all the drugs you shop for in your USA pharmacy. The only difference is that our drugs are 100% generic and are sold at a much lower price. CanadianPharmacy save together with our discount Canadian Web pharmacy.
CanadianPharmacy for economical people who care about their health.
Sincerely yours,Freddy Crowley
